recipe.title: Stir-Fried Sugar Snap Peas and Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: 6 ounces sugar snap peas, stems and strings removed
instructions: Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add peas, tomatoes and shallot. Stir-fry until peas are bright green and tomatoes are heated through, about 3 minutes. Sprinkle with vinegar and toss to coat. Season with salt an pepper and serve.
